mil.emp3.api.interfaces

Interface ICamera

  • All Superinterfaces:
    org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoAltitudeMode, org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoBase, org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoCamera, org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoPosition
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    Camera

    public interface ICamera
extends org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoCamera
    This class defines the interface to a camera.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoAltitudeMode

        org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoAltitudeMode.AltitudeMode

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      EventListenerHandle addCameraEventListener(ICameraEventListener listener)
      This method adds an event listener to the camera.
      void apply(boolean animate)
      This method causes any changes done to the camera settings to be applied to any map or object that it may be associated with.

      This method copies all settings from the camera object provided.

      This method must be used to remove the registration from the system.

      • Methods inherited from interface org.cmapi.primitives.IGeoCamera

    • Method Detail

      • copySettingsFrom

        void copySettingsFrom(ICamera from)
        This method copies all settings from the camera object provided. The settings copied are the coordinates, altitude, altitude mode, tilt, roll, range and azimuth.
        Parameters:
        from - An object that implements the ICamera interface.

      • addCameraEventListener

        EventListenerHandle addCameraEventListener(ICameraEventListener listener)
                                           throws EMP_Exception
        This method adds an event listener to the camera.
        Parameters:
        listener - A reference to a class object that implements the ICameraEventListener interface.
        Returns:
        The handle to the event registration. See EventListenerHandle
        Throws:
        EMP_Exception

      • removeEventListener

        void removeEventListener(EventListenerHandle hListener)
        This method must be used to remove the registration from the system.
        Parameters:
        hListener - The handle returned by the call to addCameraEventListener. See EventListenerHandle

      • apply

        void apply(boolean animate)
        This method causes any changes done to the camera settings to be applied to any map or object that it may be associated with.
        Parameters:
        animate - If set to true then camera movement will be animated.
